Blog.post: Heeemm and i did not have the mood to actually come to work but i dragggged myself here today.....My shift girls are the greatest we managed to do 52 k of EMEA orders even with Posating problems and all... Still feel unappreciated but will live on... I will go On, I will survive cos i dunno la but maybe cos Shirley and Sophia still around so i too... Gotta run have to handover now

this is the first time I'm doing this because of sophia lee peipei... she's so convincing that I can destress myself here... if it does not; I will strangle her... actually it all started because we were having a discussion on how unhappy we are at work... then she told me about this blogging thing... so I shall start by saying....... THAT I'M BEING UNAPPRECIATED!OVERWORKED!UNDERPAID! ALL OVER AGAIN!!!

On Mon AT AROUND 5:48am, i had a nasty fall at my mum's house.... That cost me financially and 3 stitches, a bruised palm, a bruised jaw & a wounded knee... Overall i really dunno what happened or how i actually fell but i did..

Today was okay till some1 try to take what supposed to be mine. No matter how hard i try to get angry with the fella i cannot cos in the end i will pity the person and then try to reason myself by saying that i being too hard and too critical towards the person but again i always contradict,,, So difficult but i guess i will just have to give in this time and wait for my end contract. I do not blame the fella but i pity cos by doing that now she will win but later suffer her actions
Today so boring like hell but at least it beats getting to see unhappy faces at work Nothing much happened execpt that i wish i had a permanent job with a better pay than now

Some i feel bad after i am angry but i really hate sneaky people they think i am dumb! I will play along to their pleasure but i will despise them. I gues i will just have to give in as much as i can to Lela she still young she dun know what it is like in the real working world. Sucking up too much will cause you blisters in the long run.. Or maybe i have to learn to suck up....Heeee

Dear Diary ( Or Sophia ), I am so angry with Lela, i dunno but i just feel that she can be a two headed snake. Always trying to outwin me. Ya i am her supervisor but i get no whatsoever information from her on work stuff but so eager to tell Shirley y? Maybe so she can get my position... I hate people who suck up to others shit Sorry la just angry with her

Heeeemmmh what a day today is. Already had a bad day yesterday when i mis read an important e-mail at work then all went wrong. But i mean everyone does mistakes even the braineiest ones wad....Anyway i accept the mistake. To hell with it in fact its not the end of the world yet. I just feel so bored at work i dunno if i waould want to continue here Sophia...I do not have to worry mush for DP team now cos Lela is here and she's the bossy type so can survive without me... I really love the job and all but i think i will give in the job to Lela when the time comes cos i feel our boss would only want 1 of us to stay and the other to go..Dunno lah maybe i am just feeling so down but i really love the job SOB SOB SOB! huummph just wish things were simpler ....I miss all my girls, Qiao Jia, Yee Shan, Michelle, Kaini, Cheng Leng, Choon Mei,........Sadness ahhhhh torture chhoke chhooke can't breathe hellp......Faint?>>...
